name: relationally
content:
relationally adverb
(FRIENDSHIP/FAMILY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the relationship between members of a group of people or a family: relationally aggressive She was accused of being relationally aggressive at school and was required to attend counselling sessions. Relationally, animals do not relate to other animals in the same way that humans relate to other humans.
More examplesFewer examplesHe can be described as relationally incompetent, with few friends and awkwardness when in social situations. The college is committed to developing the whole student, i.e. spiritually and relationally as well as academically.
